name: JDungeon
description:
A 3D dungeon crawler , rouge-lite or whatever you wanna call it.

My inspiration was the game "The Binding of Isaac" which i quite like.The game got a bunch of cool features and around 24 Items.If you have played "The Binding of Isaac" before you will recognize some of the mechanics.Figuring out the room generation was a lot of work and im pretty sure there is still some game breaking bug out there, but afaik the game works as it should.

On a sidenote , the game is pretty hard, so dont get confused why you can't even clear one floor.
